text: Louis Laufray (1 October 1881 - 4 February 1970) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 4000 metre freestyle event and the water polo at the 1900 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal in the latter. ==See also== * List of Olympic medalists in water polo ==References== ==External links== * Category:1881 births Category:1970 deaths Category:French male swimmers Category:French male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Olympic water polo players of France Category:Swimmers at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in water polo Category:Medalists at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Paris
title: Louis Laufray
